MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA13 postcode area of Kilmacolm. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.50pm to complete work on an underground cable on Knockbuckle Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.37pm on Tuesday, 22 December 2020.
